channel.title: Run error!
channel.description:
I've seen lately whenever i hit run on a client's run.bat it gives me:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Please help. I get this error when i try to run [PI] clients, and 317 deob clients from the search box ;D . Anyways, please help.

item.title: Run error!
item.dc:creator: @Dante112 Dante112
item.description:
@Dante112 wrote:

I’ve seen lately whenever i hit run on a client’s run.bat it gives me:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client

Please help. I get this error when i try to run [PI] clients, and 317 deob clients from the search box ;D . Anyways, please help.
